title: WTF happened to you guys?
body:
People get baited sooooooo easily now. You're like the sports cars of f*cking butthurt twelvies now - 0 to keyboard warrior in under 5 seconds.

I say something as a joke or an obvious exaggeration to make a point and you all just take it literally and/or get all defensive.

Seriously guys. just f*cking chill.

replies.body:
It's because boards are pretty much dead. No replies posts from over a day ago on the "hot" front page. We don't even have a bug report forum or GD. Even in NA the population seems like a 5th of what it was.

Most regulars are gone so people won't be used to jokes/tomfoolery.

The lack of people to joke with makes me want to go away, but I persist and hope that things work out.
Also, I have had two posts deleted due to "being a jerk". The jerkiest thing I have said was when someone told someone off for sounding official, and I replied like "Yeah I agree, you're a bas%%%% for trying to help". Like, it is as if Riot doesn't want us to use sarcasm or joke around, even if we intend to show our support.
maybe you should take it as a hint an grow up
